item.title: Dave add a quote by T.S. Eliot
item.description: "Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go." -- T.S. Eliot

item.title: Dave add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Dave add a quote by David Byrne
item.description: "Sometimes it's a form of love just to talk to somebody that you have nothing in common with and still be fascinated by their presence." -- David Byrne

item.title: Dave add a quote by T.S. Eliot
item.description: "This is the way the world ends Not with a bang but a whimper." -- T.S. Eliot

item.title: Dave add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Dave add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The road to hell is paved with adverbs." -- Stephen King

item.title: Dave add a quote by Rudyard Kipling
item.description: "Words are, of course, the most powerful drug used by mankind." -- Rudyard Kipling

item.title: Dave add a quote by Richard Dawkins
item.description: "I am against religion because it teaches us to be satisfied with not understanding the world." -- Richard Dawkins

item.title: Dave add a quote by Richard Dawkins
item.description: "The God of the Old Testament is arguably the most unpleasant character in all fiction: jealous and proud of it; a petty, unjust, unforgiving control-freak; a vindictive, bloodthirsty ethnic cleanser; a misogynistic, homophobic, racist, infanticidal, genocidal, filicidal, pestilential, megalomaniacal, sadomasochistic, capriciously malevolent bully." -- Richard Dawkins
